Grant Williams (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Grant_Williams_(actor) 0 John Joseph Williams (August 18, 1931 – July 28, 1985), known as Grant Williams, was an American film, theater and television actor. He is best remembered for his portrayal of Scott Carey in the science fiction film The Incredible Shrinking Man (1957). John_Joseph_Williams ( August_18_,_1931 – July_28_,_1985 ) , known as Grant_Williams , was an_American_film_,_theater_and_television_actor . He is_best_remembered for his_portrayal of Scott_Carey in the_science_fiction_film The_Incredible_Shrinking_Man_(_1957_) .
